org.jvnet.hudson.plugins.SSHBuilder.command:
echo "Building ${PROJECT_NAME} - Build # ${BUILD_NUMBER}.. result is at ${BUILD_URL}" echo "Slave Beaglebone at ${build_machine}" echo checking build device echo "Bash version ${BASH_VERSION}..." uname -a ls -ahl lsblk df -h echo "Shell used: $0"
swapoff -a
umount /dev/mmcblk0p* umount /sdcard/*
lsblk if mount | grep mmcblk0 then echo "Error: can't unmount sdcard!" exit 1 fi dpkg --configure -a
monitor_cpu_memory_main () { while true do date echo "CPU Usage" ps aux | sort -nrk 3,3 | head -n 5 echo "Memory Usage:" ps aux | sort -nrk 4,4 | head -n 5 sleep 60 done }
monitor_cpu_memory_main>/var/log/monitor_cpu_main.log &
cp /etc/apt/sources.list /etc/apt/sources.list.org cat > /etc/apt/sources.list <<EOL deb http://archive.debian.org/debian stretch main contrib non-free deb http://archive.debian.org/debian-security stretch/updates main contrib non-free deb [arch=armhf] http://repos.rcn-ee.com/debian/ stretch main EOL
apt -o Acquire::Check-Valid-Until=false update DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive sudo apt-get install -y apt-transport-https DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive sudo apt install -y apt-transport-https git ntpdate apt-get install -y -q -f
apt -o Acquire::Check-Valid-Until=false update
exit 0
